SELECT trn1."テストSEQ" seq, trn1."テスト名称" tname, trn1."テスト学年" academicyear, case when trn1."期間FROM" is not null then concat(to_char(trn1."期間FROM" ,'YYYY/MM/DD') , '~',to_char(trn1."期間TO" ,'YYYY/MM/DD')) else '' end as fromto, case when trn2."テスト科目" = '0.総合' then trn1."内容SEQ" else trn2."内容SEQ" end as contentseq, trn2."テスト科目" project, trn2."得点" score, trn2."満点" fulls,
trn2."学級-平均点" gradeaverage, trn2."学年-平均点" yearaverage, concat(trn2."学級-順位" , '/' , trn2."学級-人数") academicrank, concat(trn2."学年-順位" , '/' , trn2."学年-人数") academicyear2
FROM "TRN_テスト情報" trn1 LEFT JOIN "TRN_テスト科目情報" trn2 on trn1."テストSEQ" = trn2."テストSEQ" where 1=1 AND ( trn1."テスト名称" like concat('%', :testname ,'%') ) AND ( trn2."テスト科目" like concat('%', :subject ,'%') )

SELECT trn1."テストSEQ" seq, trn1."テスト名称" tname, trn1."テスト学年" academicyear, to_char(trn1."期間FROM" ,'YYYY-MM-DD') froms, to_char(trn1."期間TO" ,'YYYY-MM-DD') tos, trn1."内容SEQ" common_contentseq, trn2."テスト科目" project, trn2."内容SEQ" contentseq, COALESCE(cast(trn2."得点" as varchar) ,'') score, COALESCE(cast(trn2."満点" as varchar) ,'') fulls, COALESCE(cast(trn2."学級-平均点" as varchar) ,'') gradeaverage, COALESCE(cast(trn2."学年-平均点" as varchar) ,'') yearaverage, COALESCE(cast(trn2."学級-順位" as varchar) ,'') academicrank1, COALESCE(cast(trn2."学級-人数" as varchar) ,'') academicrank2, COALESCE(cast(trn2."学年-順位" as varchar) ,'') academicyear1, COALESCE(cast(trn2."学年-人数" as varchar) ,'') academicyear2 FROM "TRN_テスト情報" trn1 , "TRN_テスト科目情報" trn2 WHERE trn1."テストSEQ" = trn2."テストSEQ" AND trn1."テストSEQ" = !seq ORDER BY trn2."テスト科目"

INSERT INTO "TRN_テスト情報" VALUES ( !seq, !academicyear, !tname, to_timestamp(!to, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(!from, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), !content, !userid, !userid, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)

INSERT INTO "TRN_テスト科目情報" VALUES ( :seq, :subject, :content, cast(:score1 as integer), cast(:score2 as integer),
cast(:classranking1 as integer), cast(:classranking2 as integer), cast(:classaverage as numeric),
cast(:yearranking1 as integer), cast(:yearranking2 as integer), cast(:yearaverage as numeric),
:userid, :userid, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT INTO "TRN_テスト科目情報" VALUES ( :seq, :tags, :col1, :col2, cast(:col4 AS integer), cast(:col3 AS integer), cast(:col7 AS integer), cast(:col8 AS integer), cast(:col5 AS integer), cast(:col9 AS integer), cast(:col10 AS integer), cast(:col6 AS integer), :shopid, :shopid, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)

UPDATE "TRN_テスト情報" SET "テスト学年" = !academicyear ,"テスト名称" = !tname ,"期間FROM" = to_timestamp(!from, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ,"期間TO" = to_timestamp(!to, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ,"内容SEQ" = !img ,"更新ID" = !shopid ,"更新日時" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where "テストSEQ" = !seq

UPDATE "TRN_テスト科目情報" SET "満点" = cast(:fulls AS integer) ,"得点" = cast(:score AS integer) ,"学級-順位" = cast(:academicrank1 AS integer) ,"学級-人数" = cast(:academicrank2 AS integer) ,"学級-平均点" = cast(:gradeaverage AS integer) ,"学年-順位" = cast(:academicyear1 AS integer) ,"学年-人数" = cast(:academicyear2 AS integer) ,"学年-平均点" = cast(:yearaverage AS integer) ,"更新ID" = :shopid ,"更新日時" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where "テストSEQ" = :seq AND "テスト科目" = '総合成績'

UPDATE "TRN_テスト科目情報" SET "内容SEQ" = :col1 ,"内容クリアSEQ" = :col2 ,"満点" = cast(:col3 AS integer) ,"得点" = cast(:col4 AS integer) ,"学級-順位" = cast(:col5 AS integer) ,"学級-人数" = cast(:col6 AS integer) ,"学級-平均点" = cast(:col7 AS integer) ,"学年-順位" = cast(:col8 AS integer) ,"学年-人数" = cast(:col9 AS integer) ,"学年-平均点" = cast(:col10 AS integer) ,"更新ID" = :shopid ,"更新日時" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where "テストSEQ" = :seq AND "テスト科目" = :tags
